verses.verse: You shall not <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> any <S%H7794>bullock,<s%> or <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> is <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> bad <S%H1697>reputation:<s%> <S%H7451><s%> for that is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> there be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you, within <S%H259>any<s%> of your <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you, <S%H376>man<s%> or <S%H802>woman,<s%> that has <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> in <S%H5674>transgressing<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant,<s%>

And has <S%H3212>gone<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> them, either the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3394>moon,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have not <S%H6680>commanded;<s%>

And it be <S%H5046>told<s%> you, and you have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it, and <S%H1875>inquired<s%> <S%H3190>diligently,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it be <S%H571>true,<s%> and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3559>certain,<s%> that <S%H2063>such<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> is <S%H6213>worked<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>

Then shall you <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> that <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> that <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H6213>committed<s%> that <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> to your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> even that <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> that <S%H802>woman,<s%> and shall <S%H5619>stone<s%> them with <S%H68>stones,<s%> till they <S%H4191>die.<s%>

<S%H5921>At<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> shall he that is worthy of <S%H4191>death<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> but <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> he shall not be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

The <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> shall be <S%H7223>first<s%> on him to put him to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and <S%H314>afterward<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%> So you shall <S%H1197>put<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

<S%H3588>If<s%> there arise a <S%H1697>matter<s%> too <S%H6381>hard<s%> for you in <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H1779>plea<s%> and <S%H1779>plea,<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H5061>stroke<s%> and <S%H5061>stroke,<s%> being <S%H1697>matters<s%> of <S%H7379>controversy<s%> within your <S%H8179>gates:<s%> then shall you <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and <S%H5927>get<s%> you up <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose;<s%>

And you shall <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and to the <S%H8199>judge<s%> that shall be in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H1875>inquire;<s%> and they shall <S%H5046>show<s%> you the <S%H1697>sentence<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment:<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> <S%H6310><s%> to the <S%H1697>sentence,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> shall <S%H5046>show<s%> you; and you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that they <S%H3384>inform<s%> you:

<S%H5921>According<s%> to the <S%H6310>sentence<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> you, and <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they shall <S%H559>tell<s%> you, you shall <S%H6213>do:<s%> you shall not <S%H5493>decline<s%> from the <S%H1697>sentence<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they shall <S%H5046>show<s%> you, to the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> nor to the <S%H8040>left.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> that will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2087>presumptuously,<s%> and will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> that <S%H5975>stands<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H854>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> to the <S%H8199>judge,<s%> even that <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H4191>die:<s%> and you shall <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear,<s%> and do <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H2102>presumptuously.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> you are <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you, and shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, and shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein, and shall <S%H559>say,<s%> I will <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me, like as <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are <S%H5439>about<s%> me;

You shall in any wise <S%H7760>set<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose:<s%> one from <S%H7130>among<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> shall you <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you: you <S%H3021>may<s%> not <S%H5414>set<s%> a <S%H376>stranger<s%> <S%H5237><s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, <S%H834>which<s%> is not your <S%H251>brother.<s%>

But he shall not <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> to himself, <S%H3808>nor<s%> cause the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to the <S%H4616>end<s%> that he should <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H5483>horses:<s%> for as much as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> to you, You shall from now <S%H3254>on<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> that <S%H1870>way.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall he <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> to himself, that his <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H5493>turn<s%> not away: <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall he <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> to himself <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And it shall be, when he <S%H3427>sits<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of his <S%H4467>kingdom,<s%> that he shall <S%H3789>write<s%> him a <S%H4932>copy<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> in a <S%H5612>book<s%> out of that which is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%>

And it shall be with him, and he shall <S%H7121>read<s%> therein <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life:<s%> that he may <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them:

That his <S%H3824>heart<s%> be not <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up above his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and that he <S%H5493>turn<s%> not aside from the <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> to the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left:<s%> to the <S%H4616>end<s%> that he may <S%H748>prolong<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> in his <S%H4467>kingdom,<s%> he, and his <S%H1121>children,<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
